doc:
Audra Lindley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Audra_Lindley 0 Audra Marie Lindley (September 24, 1918 – October 16, 1997) was an American actress, most famous for her role as landlady Helen Roper on the sitcom Three's Company and its spin-off, The Ropers. Audra_Marie_Lindley ( September_24_,_1918 – October_16_,_1997 ) was an_American_actress , most_famous for her_role as landlady_Helen_Roper on the_sitcom_Three 's_Company and its_spin-off , The_Ropers .
